commands.description: Returns detailed information for an IP address within the specified index.
commands.name: cen-view

commands.description: Searches for an attribute within the specified index.
commands.name: cen-search

integration.description: Deprecated. Use Censys v2 instead. Censys is a search engine that allows computer scientists to ask questions about the devices and networks that compose the internet. Driven by internet-wide scanning, Censys lets researchers find specific hosts and create aggregate reports on how devices, websites, and certificates are configured and deployed.
integration.name: Censys (Deprecated)

commands.description: Returns detailed information for an IP address or SHA256 within the specified index.
commands.name: cen-view

commands.description: Return previews of hosts matching a specified search query or a list of certificates that match the given query.
commands.name: cen-search

integration.description: Censys is a search engine that allows computer scientists to ask questions about the devices and networks that compose the internet. Driven by internet-wide scanning, Censys lets researchers find specific hosts and create aggregate reports on how devices, and certificates are configured and deployed.
integration.name: Censys v2
